title: Did the LAN server In Miami, Florida recently move?
body: I used to only play LAN because being from Miami, FL. I would get 8ms ping on LAN servers compared to the 45ms on NA. But recently the ping on LAN is now 60ms. So my question is did they move the servers?

replies.body: I just made my self the same question because we are in the same boat. 3 months old post but YO ! 1 answer is better than nothing ...And no, they did not move the server it's still here in Miami,FL ( I believe ) but is not an official confirmation . Thou it happen the same to me, use to get like 10 ping , now im getting 60 or 53 at best...Don't know the exact reason. If you want to add me in LAN i have the same summoner name :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
